Class Accumulator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.expressions.gui.rpn.Accumulator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type on which operations are to be executed

    public class Accumulator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    collect digits of numbers as entered in preparation for stack push

    Michael Druckman
